ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Facilitates the creation of page layout visualizations in which words are represented as rectangles with sizes relating to the length of  the words. Which then is divided in lines and pages for easy overview of  up to quite large texts.

Facilitates the creation of page layout visualizations in which words are represented as rectangles with sizes relating to the length of  the words. Which then is divided in lines and pages for easy overview of  up to quite large texts.

name: r-ggpage
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggpage
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggpage_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggpage/ggpage_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1b8433aa5c6de760d8a1e857ab696008cb2e360b3f3d0966d561753770f328e2

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 6
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tidytext >=0.1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tidytext >=0.1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggpage')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggpage')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ggpage
  license: MIT
  summary: Facilitates the creation of page layout visualizations in which words are represented
    as rectangles with sizes relating to the length of  the words. Which then is divided
    in lines and pages for easy overview of  up to quite large texts.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ggpage
# Type: Package
# Title: Creates Page Layout Visualizations
# Version: 0.2.2
# Authors@R: person("Emil", "Hvitfeldt", email = "emilhhvitfeldt@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Facilitates the creation of page layout visualizations in which words are represented as rectangles with sizes relating to the length of  the words. Which then is divided in lines and pages for easy overview of  up to quite large texts.
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0),
# Imports: dplyr, ggplot2 (>= 2.0.0), stringr, tidytext (>= 0.1.0), magrittr, purrr, rlang
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1.9000
# Suggests: testthat, knitr, rmarkdown, covr
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-07-22 18:04:17 UTC; Emilhvitfeldthansen
# Author: Emil Hvitfeldt [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Emil Hvitfeldt <emilhhvitfeldt@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-07-27 21:10:07 UTC
